mapper.sql: version_id, version_num, version_des, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.select: select t1.version_id, t1.version_num, t1.version_des, t1.create_time, t1.update_time, t2.version_log_content, t2.create_time from fly_version t1 LEFT JOIN fly_version_log t2 ON t1.version_id=t2.version_id ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into fly_version
version_id,
version_num,
version_des,
create_time,
update_time,
is_delete,
#{versionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{versionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{versionDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mapper.update:
update fly_version
version_num = #{versionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version_des = #{versionDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fly_version set version_num = #{versionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version_des = #{versionDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
